revised_title: Exploring the Upper Partial Tones of a Pianoforte String Struck at One-Eighth of Its Length
tldr: The author investigates the upper partial tones of a pianoforte string struck at one-eighth of its length, confirming the existence of the 5th, 6th, 7th, 8th, 9th, 10th, and 11th partials, and demonstrating the influence of the string's elasticity on the resulting sound.
